name: Han's Dice (V)
Lore: 'A pair of dice dangling above Millennium Falcon''s cockpit, for luck. ''I''ve never seen anything to make me believe there''s one, all-powerful Force controlling everything.''',
Text: 'Once per turn, if just drawn for destiny, may take this Interrupt into hand to cancel and redraw that destiny. OR Cancel Watto''s Chance Cube. OR If your character of ability > 2 is in battle, use 1 Force to cancel and redraw a just drawn destiny.',
